name: Smile
description: SMILE is our addictive happiness fragrance. SMILE is a new fragrance inspired by the pursuit of joy and born out of a unique family connection.

name: Bake
description: Bake is our addictive cupcake fragrance. Everyone has their own favourite sweet treat, and for Akro, it's the small, but perfectly delicious lemon cupcake—an item we just can’t resist any time we walk past a good bakery.

name: Breathe
description: BREATHE is our addictive nature fragrance. It’s breathtaking landscapes as far as the eye can see, a world of silence, where nature is the only language.

name: Glow
description: GLOW is our addictive party fragrance. One of the reasons we go to parties is the chance to be noticed, admired, or possibly seduced.

name: Ink
description: Ink is our addictive tattoo fragrance. Everyone remembers their first tattoo: the fear, the sensation, the adrenaline rush, and the futile attempts to hide it from their parents.

name: East
description: East is our addictive travel fragrance. Of all the five senses, none has the power to transport us quite like scent.

name: Dark
description: Dark is our addictive chocolate fragrance. Dark chocolate is something you only really get into as you get older.

name: Gift Card
description: Send a unique AKRO gift.  The new virtual gift card will be immediately emailed to the recipient’s or to yourself, to print or forward later.

name: Infuse
description: INFUSE is our addictive tea fragrance. In Asia, the ancient drink of tea must be prepared with the utmost attention to detail, sometimes with an accompanying ceremony.

name: Rise
description: RISE is our addictive summer fragrance. It’s a scent informed by those unforgettable summer nights drinking Pina Coladas on faraway beaches or exploring big cities in search of new experiences and sensations.

name: Haze
description: Haze is our addictive chill fragrance. The fragrant, herbal aroma has become one of the defining smells of the modern world.

name: Malt
description: MALT is our addictive whisky fragrance. A really good whisky is a sensory experience; it's the bite on your tongue, the warmth in your cheeks, and the smoky aroma that releases when it falls over ice.

name: Night
description: NIGHT is our addictive love fragrance. Instead of just flirting with the idea of human passion, Akro has gone straight for the real thing, bottling carnal pleasure for your enjoyment.

name: Smoke
description: SMOKE is our addictive tobacco fragrance. Tobacco is an ancient crop, which for centuries, has lured people in with its enticing aroma and powerful rituals.

name: Awake
description: Awake is our addictive coffee fragrance. Everyone knows when they first really fell in love with coffee—the moment when you could no longer do without that rich, bitter caffeine hit in the morning or the steaming espresso after a good meal.
